name: Codespace to bootstrap valet in a Codespace
postCreateCommand: docker login ghcr.io/valet-customers --username ${GITHUB_USER} --password ${VALET_PASSWORD} && docker pull ghcr.io/valet-customers/valet-cli:latest && sudo bash .devcontainer/setenvars.sh ${AZDO_PROJECT} ${AZDO_ORG} ${VALET_PASSWORD} ${AZDO_TOKEN} https://github.com/  || echo 'Could not auto-build. Skipping.'
